languages.text: "Я вдовец", {n}— чинно отвечает Абеляр.{/n} "Четырежды отец, и, если эти сведения еще не устарели — одиннадцатикратный дед. Моя семья живет на Даргонусе. Никто из детей не выказал рвения или способностей к корабельной службе, и я не стал настаивать, чтобы они шли по моим стопам".

"I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."
languages.original_text: "Я вдовец", {n}— чинно отвечает Абеляр.{/n} "Четырежды отец, и, если эти сведения еще не устарели — одиннадцатикратный дед. Моя семья живет на Даргонусе. Никто из детей не выказал рвения или способностей к корабельной службе, и я не стал настаивать, чтобы они шли по моим стопам".

traits.locale_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

traits.locale_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我的妻子已经过世了。”{n}阿贝拉德认真地回答道。{/n}“我有四个子女，而且如果我的信息还准确的话，我的孙辈一共有十一人。我的家人都住在达戈努斯。我的孩子们并没有表现出在船上工作的热情，也没有这方面的才能，因此我也没办法让他们追随我的脚步。”
languages.original_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

traits.locale_text: “我的妻子已经过世了。”{n}阿贝拉德认真地回答道。{/n}“我有四个子女，而且如果我的信息还准确的话，我的孙辈一共有十一人。我的家人都住在达戈努斯。我的孩子们并没有表现出在船上工作的热情，也没有这方面的才能，因此我也没办法让他们追随我的脚步。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

languages.text: «Soy viudo», {n}responde Abelard con modestia.{/n} «Padre de cuatro hijos y, si las cosas no han cambiado, abuelo de once nietos. Mi familia vive en Dargonus. Ninguno de mis descendientes ha demostrado interés o talento alguno para servir a bordo de una nave, y no seré yo quien les obligue a seguir mis pasos».
languages.original_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

traits.locale_text: «Soy viudo», {n}responde Abelard con modestia.{/n} «Padre de cuatro hijos y, si las cosas no han cambiado, abuelo de once nietos. Mi familia vive en Dargonus. Ninguno de mis descendientes ha demostrado interés o talento alguno para servir a bordo de una nave, y no seré yo quien les obligue a seguir mis pasos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私は寡夫です」{n}アベラルドは控えめに答えた。{/n}「私は4児の父であり、覚えている限りでは11人の祖父です。私の家族はダルゴナスで暮らしています。子どもたちは誰一人として、船に乗ることを熱望することも、そこへの適性が示されることもありませんでした。そして、私も跡を継げと強要したこともありません」
languages.original_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

traits.locale_text: 「私は寡夫です」{n}アベラルドは控えめに答えた。{/n}「私は4児の父であり、覚えている限りでは11人の祖父です。私の家族はダルゴナスで暮らしています。子どもたちは誰一人として、船に乗ることを熱望することも、そこへの適性が示されることもありませんでした。そして、私も跡を継げと強要したこともありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin Witwer"{n}, antwortet Abelard nüchtern.{/n} "Ich bin vierfacher Vater und — sofern meine Informationen nicht veraltet sind — elffacher Großvater. Meine Familie lebt auf Dargonus. Keines meiner Kinder hat je Interesse bekundet oder Eignung bewiesen, an Bord eines Schiffs zu dienen, und ich hätte nie darauf bestanden, dass sie in meine Fußstapfen treten."
languages.original_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Witwer"{n}, antwortet Abelard nüchtern.{/n} "Ich bin vierfacher Vater und — sofern meine Informationen nicht veraltet sind — elffacher Großvater. Meine Familie lebt auf Dargonus. Keines meiner Kinder hat je Interesse bekundet oder Eignung bewiesen, an Bord eines Schiffs zu dienen, und ich hätte nie darauf bestanden, dass sie in meine Fußstapfen treten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis veuf, {n}répond Abélard humblement.{/n} J'ai quatre enfants et, aux dernières nouvelles, onze petits-enfants qui vivent tous sur Dargonus. Je n'ai pas voulu les pousser à marcher dans mes pas, étant donné qu'aucun d'entre eux n'a jamais exprimé le désir de servir à bord d'un vaisseau ni fait preuve des aptitudes nécessaires. »
languages.original_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis veuf, {n}répond Abélard humblement.{/n} J'ai quatre enfants et, aux dernières nouvelles, onze petits-enfants qui vivent tous sur Dargonus. Je n'ai pas voulu les pousser à marcher dans mes pas, étant donné qu'aucun d'entre eux n'a jamais exprimé le désir de servir à bord d'un vaisseau ni fait preuve des aptitudes nécessaires. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Dulum." {n}Abelard kısık bir sesle cevaplıyor.{/n} "Dört evladım, bilgim dâhilinde on bir torunum var. Ailem Dargonus'ta yaşıyor. Çocuklarım gemide hizmet etmeye yanaşmadı, zaten peşim sıra gelmelerini de istemezdim."
languages.original_text: "I am a widower," {n}Abelard responds demurely.{/n} "I am a father of four and, if my information is not outdated, a grandfather of eleven. My family lives on Dargonus. None of my children expressed any eagerness or aptitude for serving aboard ship, and I would hardly have insisted that they follow in my footsteps."

traits.locale_text: "Dulum." {n}diyor Abelard, kısık bir sesle.{/n} "Dört evladım, bilgim dâhilinde on bir torunum var. Ailem Dargonus'ta yaşıyor. Çocuklarım gemide hizmet etmeye yanaşmadı, zaten peşim sıra gelmelerini de istemezdim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
